metadata.title: I Am Legion Reborn Mod Changelog

schema.description: Mod changelog entries grouped by year, sorted newest first

features: Added the Apex Volatile to the chance to spawn lists for screamer howls and chase start on Ultimate and Insanity
Can add Apex Volatile to any difficulty via Mod config by adding 'Volatile_Apex' to spawn lists under Noise Spawns
notes: This is a 1.#.0 update, which means there may be new bugs, new things not working
Please check online for vanilla bugs first before writing mod bug reports
Official update refactored a lot of code, broke a lot of the mods code, took longer to release
This is a 1.#.0 update, which means there may be new bugs, new things not working
Please check online for vanilla bugs first before writing mod bug reports

newModule: Biters - Run and Climb: Dedicated module for toggling on biters running and climbing
fixes: Fix for where official update broke the runners and climbers that were previously working
notes: Insanity still forces biters to run and climb for balancing

fixes: Fix for Durability multiplier in Mod config also increasing the critical condition
Previously users who drastically boost the multiplier would end up with weapons flashing red around 40% of the damage
Another fix for Biter Crawler bug - missed another edge case on the last update

newEvents: HyperMode: Based on Techlands Hypermode, built around new ragdoll code. Enemies blast away with attacks, all physics effects drastically increased

7670 Days Later: Based on 28 Days Later movie. All spawns are Biters and Virals hunting human survivors. Not for casual players - grab ammo and blast through hordes. Biters run/climb based on Mod Difficulty
Low Gravity: Player and all enemies have low gravity for better ragdoll effects
Winter SlaughterLand: Castor Woods covered in snow with lite snows, snowfall, rain and snow added to weather
newModules: Volatile Be Gone: Removes all Volatiles from open world. Requires manually removing volatiles from Mod Config based on installed difficulty
Remove Weapon Mod Visuals: Removes visuals from weapons when modified to remove janky look. Keeps effects of Mods without the clutter
notes: All events are compatible with each other and can be toggled at any time
Can use Mod Config to change World Spawn density

fixes: Fix for some items in inventory being affected by Mod config modifiers (durability, price, and physics multiplier)
Fix for lightning bug particles being broken
knownIssues: No projects configured bug: Open Documents/IALR Launcher folder, delete data folder (or data/ModData/DyingLightTheBeast), then run launcher again

majorUpdate: Added Casual, Survivor, Ultimate, and Insanity difficulties

casual: Allows use of Mod config with some core update features
survivor: Goto difficulty with higher amounts of biters and infected in the world
Currently does not use custom spawn table (on the way)
At night banshees, goons, demolishers, chargers will hunt for you the more you run
ultimate: Brings on the runners - all biters can run and climb and will hunt for you
More infected will hunt for you in the day and night
insanity: Painful difficulty - balancing forces use of camouflage and keep moving

launcher: New version of Launcher released 3.1.4 that fixed small update bug

initialRelease: Initial release for Dying Light: The Beast
launcher: New version of the launcher released (3.0)
Newly designed Mod Config, Savegame tools, and Multiplayer tools based on feedback
System designed from the ground up to detect games, savegames, and system logs
Start of Unofficial Dev Tools auto-healing code - around 350 scripts supported
Can access Player_variables.scr and skills.xml and make changes, save to custom config
New backup tools will create backups when new game versions come out without mod released
notes: Without new custom tools, a lot of work that went into DL2 will not be coming to DLTB due to how games code is hidden or unmodifiable
Going script by script to see what works
Smaller events and modules released while working on the code
